lead_paragraph: The army is buying 1,000 of the trucks as part of a program to begin replacing its fleet of off-road vehicles, a Defense Ministry spokesman said.

headline.main: French Army Is Buying Fleet of Ford Pickup Trucks
headline.print_headline: French Army Is Buying Fleet of Ford Pickup Trucks

snippet: The army is buying 1,000 of the trucks as part of a program to begin replacing its fleet of off-road vehicles, a Defense Ministry spokesman said.
